headline: Halliburton (HAL) Stock Sinks As Market Gains: Here's Why
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Halliburton (HAL) stood at $25.92, denoting a -1.18% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Halliburton and Sekal Deliver World’s First Automated On-bottom Drilling System for Equinor in the North Sea
summary: HOUSTON, February 26, 2025--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) and Sekal AS deployed the world’s first automated on-bottom drilling system with the integration of Halliburton’s LOGIX™ automation and remote operations, Sekal’s Drilltronics®, and the rig automation control system.
